content:
About Me #Srachet RaiI’m Srachet Rai, a cybersecurity professional with a background in computer science and a passion for creative design. I have worked on several projects ranging from network security to innovative software solutions.
My Journey #Graduated 2018BTech in Computer ScienceCompleted my BTech with a focus on cybersecurity and software development.Joined Industry 2019Cybersecurity AnalystStarted my career working on threat intelligence and security operations.Innovation 2021Project LeadLed innovative projects combining security with creative digital experiences.Feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn or Twitter.
title: About Me

content:
Projects #Below is a showcase of my GitHub projects:
Cryio/Wifi-CSI-Based-Activity-RecognitionLeveraging the ubiquity of WiFi devices to monitor daily activities without the privacy concerns associated with vision-based methods. Collection CSI data for several different human activities, converting the data into images used as inputs for a 2D Convolutional Neural Network (CNN). The proposed CSI-based HAR system.Python 00Cryio/TinyLinuxA custom minimal Linux distribution focusing on a compact kernel, custom shell, and efficient system call integration. Designed for educational purposes and lightweight applications.C 00Cryio/healthmateHealthMate is a Flask-based text generation API using the Meta-Llama 3.1 8B model from Hugging Face. It leverages Docker for deployment and stores the model locally to optimize performance.Python 00Cryio/Synergy_ProjectUniHealth is a mobile application designed to provide hostel students with easy access to healthcare services. It enables students to log health issues, communicate with doctors, and track health progress while allowing health center staff to monitor and assist efficiently.Dart 00Cryio/siNUsoidCTFsiNUsoidCTF is a Capture The Flag (CTF) competition platform designed to challenge and enhance cybersecurity skills through engaging and diverse tasks. This repository contains resources, challenges, and documentation for participants and organizers.C 00Cryio/Maa_KarmaaA base design for the website for Maa KarmaaHTML 11Cryio/portfolioHTML 00You can also view a full list of projects on my GitHub profile.
title: Projects

content:
Hi, I'm Srachet RaiI am a cybersecurity professional with a solid foundation in web development and ethical hacking. As a Computer Science student, I am dedicated to securing digital infrastructures and addressing emerging cyber threats.I have contributed to impactful projects—including developing a mobile application that tackles real-world health challenges—and earned certifications in Ethical Hacking and Machine Learning. My goal is to deliver innovative, practical solutions that blend creativity with technical expertise.In my leadership roles with the Google Developers Student Club and TEDxNIITUniversity, I drive innovation and leverage my animation skills to craft immersive user experiences. Welcome to my portfolio.View ProjectsFeatured Project #Featured Project – Innovative Cybersecurity SolutionGalleryMy GitHub Projects #Discover my latest projects on GitHub.
